title: UFYB 72: Your Skepticals: Cognitive Bias, Neuroscience and Negative Thoughts
itunes:title: Your Skepticals: Cognitive Bias, Neuroscience and Negative Thoughts
description:
I'm taking a slightly different route on the podcast this week, bringing you a metaphor that is going to act as an amazing tool for your thought work. Today, I'm using neuroscience to demonstrate the real power of your brain and why confirmation bias exists.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/72

Text your email address to 347-997-1784 for a worksheet that you can use to help adjust the prescription on your skepticals. Reply with "skeptical" (all lowercase).
content:encoded:

itunes:subtitle: How our brains are constantly editing what we see.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
